CodeList.Name: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory Severe Dementia Version Questionnaire Test Name

Description.TranslatedText: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory Severe Dementia Version test name.

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, Severe Dementia Version - Did {S} clear the dishes from the table after a meal or snack?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: ADCS-ADL Severe Dementia - Clear Dishes After Meal or Snack

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, Severe Dementia Version - If yes, which best describes how {S} usually performed.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: ADCS-ADL Severe Dementia - Description of Usual Performance of Clearing Dishes

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, Severe Dementia Version - If yes, which best describes how {S} usually performed.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: ADCS-ADL Severe Dementia - Description of Usual Performance of Garbage Disposal

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, Severe Dementia Version - In the past 4 weeks, did {S} dispose of garbage or litter in an appropriate place or container at home?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: ADCS-ADL Severe Dementia - Dispose of Garbage in Appropriate Place at Home

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, Severe Dementia Version - In the past 4 weeks, did {S} usually manage to find his/her personal belongings at home?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: ADCS-ADL Severe Dementia - Find Personal Belongings at Home

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, Severe Dementia Version - If yes, which best describes how {S} usually performed.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: ADCS-ADL Severe Dementia - Description of Usual Performance of Finding Personal Belonging at Home

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, Severe Dementia Version - If yes, which best describes {S} optimal performance.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: ADCS-ADL Severe Dementia - Description of Optimal Performance of Getting Around Outside of Home

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, Severe Dementia Version - In the past 4 weeks, did {S} get around (or travel) outside of his/her home?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: ADCS-ADL Severe Dementia - Get Around Outside Home

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, Severe Dementia Version - If yes, which best describes {S} highest level of performance.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: ADCS-ADL Severe Dementia - Description of Highest Performance of Telephone Use

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: ADL02-Left at Home for 1 Hour or Longer
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: ADL02-Left at Home for 1 Hour or Longer
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, Severe Dementia Version - Was {S} left: at home for an hour or longer during the day?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: ADCS-ADL Severe Dementia - Alone at Home for One Hour or Longer

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: ADL02-Left at Home for Less Than 1 Hour
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: ADL02-Left at Home for Less Than 1 Hour
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, Severe Dementia Version - Was {S} left: at home for less than 1 hour during the day?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: ADCS-ADL Severe Dementia - Alone at Home for Less Than One Hour

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, Severe Dementia Version - Was {S} left: away from home for 15 minutes or longer, during the day?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: ADCS-ADL Severe Dementia - Alone Away From Home for Fifteen Minutes or Longer

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, Severe Dementia Version - In the past 4 weeks, was {S} ever left on his/her own?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: ADCS-ADL Severe Dementia - Subject Left on Their Own

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, Severe Dementia Version - In the past 4 weeks, did {S} obtain a hot or cold beverage for him/herself?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: ADCS-ADL Severe Dementia - Obtain Beverage for Self

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, Severe Dementia Version - If yes, which best describes {S} highest level of performance.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: ADCS-ADL Severe Dementia - Description of Highest Performance of Obtaining Beverage

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, Severe Dementia Version - Regarding grooming, in the past 4 weeks, which best describes {S} optimal performance?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: ADCS-ADL Severe Dementia - Description of Optimal Performance of Grooming

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, Severe Dementia Version - Regarding walking (or getting around in a wheelchair) in the past 4 weeks, which best describes {S} optimal performance?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: ADCS-ADL Severe Dementia - Description of Optimal Performance of Walking

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, Severe Dementia Version - In the past 4 weeks, did {S} ever appear to pay attention to conversation or small talk for at least 5 minutes?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: ADCS-ADL Severe Dementia - Pay Attention to Conversation

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, Severe Dementia Version - In the past 4 weeks, did {S} usually run water from a faucet to wash {S} hands or face without help?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: ADCS-ADL Severe Dementia - Turn On Faucet to Wash Without Help

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, Severe Dementia Version - Did {S} usually select or ask for different programs or {S} favorite show?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: ADCS-ADL Severe Dementia - Select or Ask for Television Program

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, Severe Dementia Version - Sum of Items 1-5.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: ADCS-ADL Severe Dementia - Sum of Items 1-5

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, Severe Dementia Version - Sum of Items 13-15.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: ADCS-ADL Severe Dementia - Sum of Items 13-15

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, Severe Dementia Version - Sum of Items 16-19.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: ADCS-ADL Severe Dementia - Sum of Items 16-19

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, Severe Dementia Version - Sum of Items 6-8.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: ADCS-ADL Severe Dementia - Sum of Items 6-8

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, Severe Dementia Version - Sum of Items 9-12.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: ADCS-ADL Severe Dementia - Sum of Items 9-12

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: ADL02-Talk About TV Content While Watch
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: ADL02-Talk About TV Content While Watch
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, Severe Dementia Version - Did {S} usually talk about the content of a program while watching it?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: ADCS-ADL Severe Dementia - Talk About TV Content While Watching

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: ADL02-Talk About TV Content Within a Day
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: ADL02-Talk About TV Content Within a Day
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, Severe Dementia Version - Did {S} talk about the content of a program within a day (24 hours) after watching it?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: ADCS-ADL Severe Dementia - Talk About TV Content Within a Day After Watching

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, Severe Dementia Version - Total Score.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: ADCS-ADL Severe Dementia - Total Score

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, Severe Dementia Version - In the past 4 weeks, did {S} usually turn off the faucet after finishing running water without help?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: ADCS-ADL Severe Dementia - Turn Off Faucet After Wash Without Help

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, Severe Dementia Version - In the past 4 weeks, did {S} usually turn off lights without help when leaving a room or going to sleep?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: ADCS-ADL Severe Dementia - Turn Off Light Without Help Leaving Room

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, Severe Dementia Version - In the past 4 weeks, did {S} usually turn on a light without help when entering a dark room or area?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: ADCS-ADL Severe Dementia - Turn On Light Without Help Entering Room

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, Severe Dementia Version - In the past 4 weeks, did {S} use a telephone?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: ADCS-ADL Severe Dementia - Use a Telephone

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, Severe Dementia Version - Regarding bathing, in the past 4 weeks, which best describes {S} usual performance?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: ADCS-ADL Severe Dementia - Description of Usual Performance of Bathing

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, Severe Dementia Version - Regarding bowel and bladder function at the toilet, which best describes {S} usual performance during the past 4 weeks?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: ADCS-ADL Severe Dementia - Usual Bowel and Bladder Function at Toilet

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, Severe Dementia Version - If yes, which best describes {S} usual degree of participation.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: ADCS-ADL Severe Dementia - Usual Conversation Participation

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, Severe Dementia Version - Regarding eating, which best describes {S} usual performance during the last 4 weeks?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: ADCS-ADL Severe Dementia - Description of Usual Performance of Eating

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, Severe Dementia Version - Regarding physically getting dressed, which best describes {S} usual performance in the past 4 weeks?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: ADCS-ADL Severe Dementia - Description of Usual Performance of Physically Getting Dressed

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory, Severe Dementia Version - In the past 4 weeks, did {S} watch television?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: ADCS-ADL Severe Dementia - Watch Television

CodeList.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory Severe Dementia Version Questionnaire Test Name
CodeList.nciodm:PreferredTerm: CDISC Questionnaire ADCS-ADL Severe Dementia Test Name Terminology
